name: Bee Colonies
content:
Description: information on various bee colonies in the US, their populations, and their losses or renovations within.

[Source](https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/tree/master/data/2022/2022-01-11)

Columns:

* Year (numerical): year of analysis for that colony cluster
* Months (string): span of months in that given year in which data was collected
* State (string): US state in which colony data was collected
* Colony max (numerical): maximum amount of observed bee colonies in that cluster
* Colony lost (numerical): amount of bee colonies lost in that cluster
* Colony added (numerical): amount of bee colonies added within that timespan
* Colony renovation (numerical): amount of colonies renovated by USDA scientists
* Colony renovation pct (numerical): percentage of colonies in that cluster which were renovated
